entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A professor and headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as writing to the Dursleys.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: A magical tree that can attack people who come near it.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's Muggle relatives, mentioned as being disappointed that the Whomping Willow hadn't squashed Harry.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, who appears with a wand and conjures food for Harry and Ron.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, whose desk is targeted by Professor McGonagall's wand.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Ron's brothers, who are mentioned as flying a car.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: Non-magical people, mentioned as not seeing the flying car.

relationships.description: The Whomping Willow is described as trying to squash Harry.
Professor McGonagall's wand targets Snape's desk.
Ron and Harry are described as friends, sharing sandwiches and discussing their luck.
